item.title: Act fast: It's time to start booking holiday flights for the best deals
item.description: TPG recommends booking flights one to two months ahead of the holidays. Now is the booking sweet spot.

item.title: Is the Delta Reserve Amex worth the annual fee?
item.description: The Delta SkyMiles Reserve American Express Card is the top-tier credit card from Amex and Delta Air Lines. Let's dive into whether this card is right...

item.title: Bucket-list sites, easy travel: Why I loved my first Globus tour in Europe â€” and you will, too
item.description: TPG's Gene Sloan offers a glimpse at what a Globus tour is like after a seven-day trip to Scotland with the brand.

item.title: American, JetBlue and Spirit are moving at LAX to make way for a new terminal
item.description: Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) is moving American, JetBlue and Spirit out of Terminal 5 to rebuild the aging terminal and concourse.

item.title: Earn 90,000 AAdvantage miles with this offer on Citi's new American Airlines card
item.description: Citi's AAdvantage credit card lineup come with solid welcome bonus offers for more AA miles to use on American Airlines flights. Here's what to know.
